sentence: As Breitbart News reported in January, a Wyoming straw poll has Cheney losing to the Trump-backed Harriet Hageman.
author: Paul Bois
title: Trump Blasts Reps. Nancy Mace, Liz Cheney at South Carolina Rally

sentence: Her main challenger in this race, Harriet Hageman, went in the opposite direction: from fervent Never Trumper in 2016 to a fervent Trumper today.
title: It's Never a Good Time for the Hunter Biden Story
